plot: A crazed physician marries a wealthy women and, with the help of his demented assistant, murders them for their money.
title: The Mad Doctor
plot_es: A crazed physician marries a wealthy women and, with the help of his demented assistant, murders them for their money.
plot_en: A crazed physician marries a wealthy women and, with the help of his demented assistant, murders them for their money.

cast.role: Dr. George Sebastian /              Dr. Frederick Langamann
cast.name: Basil Rathbone
